item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I am Aqeel Anwar, a Senior Machine Learning Engineer at NVIDIA, where I work on advancing the perception systems that power autonomous vehicles.

item.title: Tech Blog
item.description: Content Creation # I like to create easy-to-understand visualizations (still/animated) for various Machine Learning topics.

item.title: Travel
item.description: Travel has always been a passion of mine — a way to explore new cultures, challenge perspectives, and collect stories along the way.

item.title: Work Experience
item.description: Senior Machine Learning Engineer — Autonomous Vehicles NVIDIA Corporation, Santa Clara, CA Jun 2021 - Present Working on improving perception DNN performance for autonomous vehicles using computer vision, machine learning and Generative AI based synthetic data generation.
